title: CISI Educational Launches Ethical AI Certification to Elevate Awareness in Financial Services
description: In a concerted effort to address the complex challenges posed by the widespread adoption of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in the financial services sector, the Educational Charity arm of the Chartered Institute of Securities and Investment (CISI) has introduced a groundbreaking Ethical Artificial Intelligence certification program. The initiative, which marks the 695th endeavor under the guidance ... Read more

title: Meta and IBM Join Forces to Create AI Alliance
description: Meta Platforms Inc. and International Business Machines Corp. have partnered with over 40 other companies and organizations to establish an industry coalition known as the AI Alliance. This coalition is dedicated to advancing open-source artificial intelligence (AI) technology, with the primary goal of sharing knowledge and reducing risks associated with AI development. Focusing on responsible ... Read more

title: Shiba Inu burn rate explodes, buy signal emerges
description: The second-largest memecoin, Shiba Inu (SHIB), has gained bullish momentum as the asset’s burn rate registered a massive rise. SHIB is down by 5.8% in the past 24 hours and is trading at $0.000009 at the time of writing. The…

title: Thirdweb reveals major security flaw in common smart contracts
description: Smart contract development firm Thirdweb has discovered security vulnerabilities that potentially “affect various smart contracts in the Web3 ecosystem.” Thirdweb, an all-in-one development platform that provides EVM smart contracts, says it found a vulnerability in a popular open-source library that…

title: Decentralizing Computing Power: How io.net is Changing the AI Landscape
description: io.net is a decentralized cloud computing network designed to grant access to GPUs. The platform offers io.net cloud, io.net explorer and io.worker as its defined value propositions. io.net is a Solana, Render, Ray, and Filecoin-powered decentralized computing network that addresses the challenges faced by machine learning engineers in accessing distributed cloud clusters. The platform is [...]

title: Altcoins Riding Bitcoin’s Wave: Dogecoin and Bitcoin Cash Soar Amid BTC’s Rally
description: Altcoins join Bitcoin to stage a rally following the rising Interest of both retail and institutional investors. The possible approval of a spot Bitcoin ETF is said to have triggered this incredible run across the broad crypto market.  Bitcoin (BTC) is back on its feet with another impressive run of 13 percent in the last [...]
